description: Interactive changelog update skill that notifies users of Claude Code updates and helps them apply relevant changes

features.name: Skill scaffold and SKILL.md
features.description: Create basic skill structure with triggers, metadata, and frontmatter

features.name: Changelog diff detection
features.description: Compare local changelog version against fetched version, identify new entries

features.name: Entry parser with category detection
features.description: Parse changelog entries and classify by category (config, command, tool, architecture, fix, improvement, breaking)

features.name: Action type mapper
features.description: Map categories to action types (awareness, config_update, learn_command, migrate)

features.name: Interactive presentation layer
features.description: Display grouped updates with action buttons using AskUserQuestion tool

features.name: Config update handler
features.description: Execute settings.json and env var updates when user approves

features.name: Command demo handler
features.description: Allow user to try new commands directly from the update flow

features.name: Migration guide generator
features.description: For breaking changes, generate contextual migration steps based on user's codebase

features.name: Acknowledgment tracking
features.description: Track which updates user has seen/dismissed to avoid re-prompting

features.name: Integration with changelog-tracker
features.description: Hook into existing changelog-tracker skill to trigger updates automatically

features.name: Batch apply mode
features.description: Allow user to apply all recommended changes at once

features.name: Summary report generation
features.description: Generate markdown summary of what was updated and what was skipped
